Auezov South Kazakhstan State University: The M. O. Auezov South Kazakhstan State University (Kazakh: М. О. Әуезов атындағы Оңтүстік Қазақстан мемлекеттік университеті) also known as Mukhtar Auezov South Kazakhstan University, is a multidisciplinary higher educational institution in the city of Shymkent, which provides training in 76 technical and humanitarian specialties. It was founded in 1943.
